title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: March 18, 2018 / 7:25 PM / Updated an hour ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 11 Min Read Mar 18 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Women's Singles matches on Sunday ..
